{{Quote|My husband, the late Lord Luthor. He was an oaf as well. He managed to ride off a cliff while hawking. They say he was looking up the sky and paid no mind to where his horse was taking him.|Lady Olenna Tyrell|Dark Wings, Dark Words}}
'''Luthor Tyrell''' is an unseen character in ''[[Game of Thrones]]''. He is deceased when the events of the series begin and is not expected to appear in the series. He is mentioned by his widow [[Olenna Tyrell]] in "[[Dark Wings, Dark Words]]".
sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Luthor Tyrell's backstory remains the same, except that there is no mentioning if he ever has been betrothed to any other woman before his marriage to Olenna.

After short conversation with Olenna, [[Tyrion Lannister]] wondered if Luthor deliberately rode off that cliff.
